long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supernormal automatically takes detailed meeting notes so you don‚Äôt have to! 

Supernormal uses state-of-the-art AI models including GPT-4 and GPT-4o to automatically capture your meetings on Google Meet and instantly deliver detailed meeting notes with a transcript, detailed summary, and action items. 

With Supernormal, you can capture all kinds of meetings including 1:1s, client meetings, interviews, sales calls, and more. And Supernormal makes it easier than ever to collaborate on meeting notes after a meeting with automatic sharing and link-sharing. 

More than 250,000 teams trust Supernormal to capture their meetings including leaders at Fortune 500 companies, digital marketers, recruiters, salespeople, product managers, engineers, teachers, students, and anyone who wants detailed meeting notes without lifting a finger! 

Learn more ‚¨áÔ∏è

üÜì Supernormal is FREE 
Supernormal‚Äôs Starter plan is FREE and includes unlimited meetings and 1K minutes of meeting storage per member. 

üìù Meeting Notes with Transcriptions
Supernormal offers automatic transcription of your meetings in real-time. Whether you're using Google Meet, Zoom, or Microsoft Teams, Supernormal captures what happens in your meeting, converting it into an accurate written transcription, so you can focus on the discussion without worrying about taking detailed notes.

‚úçÔ∏è Summaries and Action Items
Supernormal goes beyond transcriptions by automatically generating meeting summaries. Leveraging advanced AI algorithms, Supernormal accurately extracts key points, decisions, and action items from the meeting transcriptions, saving you 5-10 minutes per meeting summarizing the discussion.

‚ö°Ô∏è Action Item Management
Supernormal simplifies task management by providing a centralized location for all action items that arise from meetings. You can assign tasks, set deadlines, and track progress within the app. This feature ensures accountability and enables efficient collaboration among team members..

üîí Secure and Private
Supernormal prioritizes privacy and security, employing state-of-the-art encryption, GDPR compliance, and SOC2 Type 2 certification. 

‚ûú Help & Feedback 
Check out supernormal.com for additional information or visit our help center at help.supernormal.com.
